lead_paragraph: New Orleans signed the free-agent cornerback Aaron Glenn, hoping he can help shore up a pass defense that gave up numerous big plays last season. Glenn, a 14-year veteran who started four games for Jacksonville in 2007, has 41 career interceptions, 6 returned for touchdowns.
